content:
1. Maallikayil vachee vannaall-kartthan kalppichaan
Ningallkku samaadhaanam mal-priyashishyanmaare!
/tningall sahitham-ente samaadhaanam
/tvaazhattathinaal-paapavimochanavum
Dushdngkal ninnum nithyam-rakshayumundaakum
Shleehanmaarude santaapam-nirmmoolam neekki
/thaaleluyyaa-santoshippichu.

2. Sandehichathinaal paade-sandeham theerttha
Maartthommaathan smrthi nithyam-ghoshicheedatte.
/tkumpittevam-thaanettuparanyaan
/tbhamgam koodaa-thekasuthan nee thaan
Sathyam nee mama kartthaavum-sarvveshanumallo
Kandaalum thal smrthi sabhayil kondaadidunnu.
/thaaleluyyaa -thal praarththhana sharanam.
